name: Oxynaut (SAE Amsterdam)
description:
Oxynaut 

2.5D platformer 

You are Ivy, a rescue worker astronaut. Send to mars to investigate the disappearance of a science team. Upon arrival Ivy soon discovers there is more to the planet than she would have known. Collect all the audio logs and uncover the secrets of the red planet in order to save the science team and more. Take care of your oxygen level while you explore the environment. Don't forget to collect the oxygen cannisters. 

Can be played on Windows PC and Android 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

SAE Amsterdam Student project 2019 

  • 3 months time 
  • 10 game students 
  • 4 audio students 
  • 1 programmer
